optimize.description: Disables resource-intensive features (disabled by default on phones)

autoskip.description: Automatically closes the console after the page loads

landing.hero: Mosunov Valery, <age> old. A self-taught full-stack dev, aspiring UI/UX designer from Russia.

active.title: Portfolio 2023
active.p: This website is the main place where I showcase my IT achievements. Here you can request a project or explore my abilities in this topic.

other.label: other
other.p: Although these projects are no longer functional, they have been preserved on the Internet as an archive of early web development.

slides.txt: I really enjoy getting inspiration from works on Dribbble and Awwwards and I'm very grateful to the authors for sharing.
I couldn't think of anything to do in this section, so I guess I can share my thoughts with this silly quote collection.
I will never part ways with Visual Studio Code, it's the only decent product from Microsoft ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
